                                     //Rest lowercase\n        \n        return false;\n    }\n    \n    public boolean checkUpperCase(String word) //Checking if it's entirely UPPERCASE\n    {\n        int count=word.length();\n        for(char c : word.toCharArray())\n        {\n            if(c>=65 && c<= 90)\n                count--;\n        }\n        if(count==0)\n            return true;\n        \n        return false;\n    }\n    \n      public boolean checkLowercase(String word) //Checking if it's entirely Lowercase\n    {\n        int count=word.length();\n        for(char c : word.toCharArray())\n        {\n            if(c>=97 && c<= 122)\n                count--;\n        }\n        if(count==0)\n            return true;\n        \n        return false;\n    }\n    \n    public boolean checkFirstUpperRestLower(String word) //Self-Explanatory\n    {\n        if(word.charAt(0)>=97 && word.charAt(0)<=122)\n             return false;\n        int count=0;\n        for(int i=1;i<word.length();i++)\n        {\n           if(word.charAt(i)>=97 && word.charAt(i)<= 122)\n                count++;\n        }\n        \n        if(count==word.length()-1)\n            return true;\n        \n        return false;\n    }\n    \n    \n    \n}","compare_result":"","title_slug":"detect-capital"}
